body.p: Summit Valley St. John’s Lutheran Church. Shennington, A. W. Loock, pastor. English services Sunday, March 19, at 9:45 a.m. St. Mathew’s, Lincoln English services Sunday, March 19, at 11 a.m. Mr. and Mrs. E. J. Johnston of St. Paul, Minnesota, are visiting at the home of Mrs. Johnston’s brother Wm. Woombill. Mr. and Mrs. Harold Nienast were Sunday dinner guests with Mrs. Nienast’s parents. Mrs. Amelia Seflow is very ill at this writing. Her daughter, Mrs. Clara __ of Wilton, is helping to care for her. Mrs. Clara Schroeder entertained the Homemakers Wednesday. Quite a few attended and all enjoyed a very good time and a delicious lunch. Miss Alice Plunkett was a Sparta visitor Saturday.
